byLineInfo.name: Visit the Rapid Care First Aid Store

features: This OSHA/ANSI compliant eye wash station with first Aid kit comes with one 16 oz. Bottle of sterile isotonic buffered solution for washing, flushing and irrigation of the eyes, and OSHA/ANSI compliant poly first aid kit for 25 person.

FDA compliant: The sterile isotonic buffered eye wash solution is carefully formulated to help clear eyes of any foreign material such as dust, pollen, and chemicals and to relieve irritation, itching and burning. It is also suitable as a daily cleanser.
To use directly from the bottle, Our plastic bottles are designed to be squeezable. To avoid risk of contamination, eye washes are recommended for single use only.

First aid kit includes: 30 adhesive bandage PE (1" X 3"); 30 adhesive bandage fabric (1" X 3"); 20 fabric junior strip; 3 knuckle bandage; 3 fingertip bandage; 3 butterfly closure; tape roll; triangular bandage; 2 safety pins; trauma pad (5" X 9"); eye pad; 4 gauze pad (4" X 4"); 4 gauze pad (3" X 3"); 4 gauze pad (2" X 2"); gauze roll (2"); 4 examination gloves; instant cold Pack; scissors; Tweezer; 6 burn gel/cream; 6 antibiotic ointment; 10 alcohol pads; 10 antiseptic towelettes; case; first aid guide; 2 finger splints; 20 cotton tip applicators; eye wash; 2 splinter removers
Wall mountable and easy to install. Mounting hardware provided. Station measures 20" x 14" x 4".
body.description: Rapid Care Eyewash Station With Burn Relief Kit has a comprehensive selection of quality first aid components to include buffered eye wash bandages, burn dressing and CPR barrier to exceed ANSI / OSHA 2015 Standards

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for business
reviews.reviewText: Installed this for employees in our auto shop, great go to emergency station to have, hopefully it doesn't get used very often

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eye wash station is large provides eye wash for up to 2 peopled
reviews.reviewText: Large brightly colored easy to see

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly the set up we needed, simple to mount on the wall, now we have an eye wash station. We use this station weekly, so many opportunities to keep our employees safe and ready to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Came with Rectangle Bottles that don't fit in wall mount
reviews.reviewText: Ordered 4 of these for our different company locations and they all came with two rectangle bottles that do not sit in the wall mount kit. They fall right out. The picture of the product on Amazon shows circular shaped bottles. We had the same exact product before and it had the circular botles that sat in the wall mount nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good to have but holder is worthless
reviews.reviewText: Having emergency eye wash on hand is never a bad idea. I installed these in my woodshop, but when mounted on the wall the bottles fall out of the cheap holder. The holder is basically plastic packaging material you see used for shipping. Rather than spending the time to make a sturdy holder, I've resorted to tapping them in, which will pull away easily in an emergency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT VALUE WITH LONG SHELF LIFE
reviews.reviewText: A great value with long shelf life. They even included mounting hardware (screws and wall anchors) . A pleasant surprise. Didn't have to drive to a hardware store to buy it. Nice touch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately the saline solution did not fit properly in the slot and fell immediately as I put it on the wall and spilled everywhere. The bottle I received is completely different than the one on the picture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Works great in our shop. Green color is good visual.
